description: Equip: Spear of Bastion's duration is increased by 4 sec. While you remain within Spear of Bastion's area your critical strike damage is increased by 25%.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.
Equip: Echoing Reprimand now animacharges 4 combo points.
Equip: Casting a Frost, Fire and Arcane spell within 10 sec of each other increases your Critical Strike damage of all your spells by 20%. This effect can only occur once every 30 sec.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Bonus Kill Shots from Flayed Shot cause 6 targets within 12 yds to bleed for 60% of the damage dealt by Kill Shot over 6 sec.

Equip: Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

Haunted Mask: Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.
Equip: Your Mortal Strike has a 25% chance to apply the Colossus Smash effect to your target for 6 sec.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.

Equip: Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains 2% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to 100%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for 20 sec, blasting your target for 1,061 Shadow damage.
Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.
Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.
Equip: Earth Shield healing is increased by 150% if your Earth Shield target is below 75% health, and Healing Wave adds a stack of Earth Shield to your target, up to 9 maximum stacks.
Equip: Demon's Bite leaves an open wound on your enemy dealing 2,538 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 65%.
Equip: Spear of Bastion's duration is increased by 4 sec. While you remain within Spear of Bastion's area your critical strike damage is increased by 25%.
Equip: Earth Elemental has a permanent Earthquake attached to it.
Equip: The remaining cooldown on Vendetta is reduced by 1 sec for every 30 Energy you expend.

Equip: Casting Unholy Nova summons a Rattling Mage that gains 2% additional damage and healing each time an enemy affected by Unholy Transfusion is damaged by an ally, up to 100%.

The Rattling Mage serves you for 20 sec, blasting your target for 1,130 Shadow damage.
Equip: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are active on a single target, their effects are increased 40%.

Equip: Enter a pact with the Death Loa, calling forth a haunted mask that lingers on a target until Fae Guardians ends.

Haunted Mask: Copies the benefit of the current faerie on its target. Follows your Direct Mask.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Demon's Bite leaves an open wound on your enemy dealing 2,703 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 65%.
Equip: Spear of Bastion's duration is increased by 4 sec. While you remain within Spear of Bastion's area your critical strike damage is increased by 25%.
Equip: Earth Elemental has a permanent Earthquake attached to it.

Equip: You and your Kindred Spirit each gain a bonus secondary stat based on their Covenant. This bonus is doubled while the bond is Empowered.

Kyrian: Mastery increased by 150.
Night Fae: Haste increased by 8%.
Venthyr: Critical Strike chance increased by 8%.
Necrolord: Versatility increased by 8%.

Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
